entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT, Penticton
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 2:49 a.m. PDT Friday 5 May 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, 17.6Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Penticton Airport 4:00 AM PDT Friday 5 May 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy

Visibility: 24 km
Humidity: 61 %

Wind: SSE 33 km/h gust 53 km/h

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of showers or thunderstorms. Low 12. POP 60%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early this evening. 60 percent chance of showers or thunderstorms. Wind north 30 km/h becoming light this evening. Low 12. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Thursday 4 May 2023

entry.title: Friday: A few showers. High 19.
entry.summary: Showers. Risk of a thunderstorm in the afternoon. Amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind becoming south 20 km/h in the afternoon. High 19. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Thursday 4 May 2023
